questionsAndAnswers.question: Q: How long does my video need to be?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A: We ask that you keep the videos between 1-2 minutes.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Q: What type of video should I submit?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A: This is your choice. Have fun and be creative.Video files must be in MOV, MPEG, MPG, MP4, M4V, VOB, FLV, AVI, ASF, DIVX, WMV format. For best results, Videos should be in 16:9 aspect ratio

questionsAndAnswers.question: Q: Who should apply?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A: Middle school or high school students or full-time college students.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Q: How much is the scholarship?
Q: Will my friends be able to vote on my video?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A. Possibly. After December 15, 2015, the judges will pick the top 10 videos. These videos will be viewable on the site, and the public will be encouraged to vote.
